common.twofa_description: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email.
common.reset_password_text: To reset and change your password, please enter your email in the input field. A password reset confirmation code will be sent to your email.
common.otp_enter_code_and_new_password: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your email and your new password.
common.delete_account_text: After confirmation, your account will be deactivated and permanently deleted within 7 days.
common.delete_account_message: Your account has been successfully deactivated and will be permanently deleted within 7 days.
common.delete_account_thanks: Thank you for using our service!
common.delete_account_redirect: You will be automatically redirected in 10 seconds
common.page_in_progress: We are working on this page to make it as helpful and convenient for you as possible. Very soon you’ll find new information and features here!
common.errorDescription: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again or return to the homepage.
common.have_an_idea: Have an idea or a question? Write to us!
common.checkName: Check if you spelled the name correctly
common.date_picker_title: When are you planning to leave?
common.forgotPageTitle: Enter your email — we'll send a password reset link.
common.otpVerifyText: Please enter the one-time password sent to email
common.authActionsReview: Leave a review about the trip
common.authOr: Or
common.emailNotValid: This is not a valid email.
common.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
common.local_time: Departure/arrival time is indicated in local time.
common.accept_rules: I accept the terms of the public offer, privacy policy, and returns policy.

name_validate.noSpecialCharacters: Name must not contain special characters

password_validate.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password_validate.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password_validate.number: Password must contain at least one number
password_validate.special: Password must contain at least one special character (!@#$%^&*)

otp_validate.invalid: The code must be exactly 6 digits
